briefTitle: Digital Breast Tomosynthesis (DBT) to Improve Assessment of Resection Margins in Invasive Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Optimal Imaging Methods to Reduce Repeat Surgery in Invasive Breast Cancer
conditions: Invasive Breast Cancer, Mastectomy, Segmental, Margins of Excision
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Positive resection margin(s) in the final histopathology
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Newly diagnosed women with biopsy-verified invasive breast cancer planned for breast conserving surgery.
* Age \> 18 year

Exclusion Criteria:

* Previous surgery for pre-malignant or malignant lesions in the breast
* Planned mastectomy
